feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Yet another APKPure bugfix (last one) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1778

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.18...v1.1.19

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve zh-TW traditional Chinese translation by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1785
  • French corrections by @Kevinr99089 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1787
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1800
  • GitLab bugfix for some APK URLs (#1790)
  • Fix Uptodown - was completely broken (#1796)
  • Slight XAPK support improvement + BG install bugfix
  • Update de.json by @Mr-Update in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1783

New Contributors

  • @PeterDaveHello made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1785
  • @Mr-Update made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1783

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.19...v1.1.20

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updated hu.json by @gidano in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1803
  • Fr: Rollback import export change by @Kevinr99089 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1807
  • Add Esperanto translation by @pgmtx in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1815
  • Update de.json by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1824
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1826
  • Improved APKPure compatibility by prioritizing APK when available (over XAPK)
  • Auto-select direct APK source for URLs ending in '.apk' (#1820)
  • Handle install failures more gracefully on apps page (#1782)
  • Enabled ZH-TW and EO languages
  • Added "allow insecure request" option (#1825)

New Contributors

  • @pgmtx made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1815

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.20...v1.1.21

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Format exported json by @lagodimos in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1850
  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1832
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1853
  • Add Tencent App Store (#1848)
  • Enable icon caching (#1837)

New Contributors

  • @lagodimos made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1850
  • @summoner001 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1832

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.21...v1.1.22
